Large icons, minimal text, tap-to-navigate.

## Sports (Visual Icons)
Users tap LARGE icons to filter:
⚽ Calcio | 🏀 Basket | 🏐 Volley | 🎾 Padel

## Database (Supabase)

users: id, email, name, avatar, sports[], location{city, region}, stats{matches, wins, losses}

tournaments: id, name, sport, organizer_id, type, location{venue, city}, dates{start, end}, status, max_teams, public, registered_teams[]

teams: id, name, sport, captain_id, members[], logo, stats{matches, wins, losses}

matches: id, tournament_id, sport, teams{home{name, score}, away{name, score}}, status (scheduled|live|finished), location{venue, city}, datetime{scheduled, started, finished}, submitted_by, media[]

rankings: id, tournament_id, standings[{position, team_name, played, wins, losses, points}]

## Access
GUEST: Browse all results, view standings (NO barriers)
REGISTERED: All + submit results, create tournaments

## Visual Design


Rules:
- Icons min 80x80px (tappable)
- Cards with large images
- Bottom nav: icons only
- Color-coded by sport

## Screens

### HOME (Results Feed)
TOP: 4 LARGE sport icons (⚽🏀🏐🎾) - tap to filter, colored ring when active

LIVE SECTION (if ongoing):
- Red "LIVE" badge pulsing
- Giant score: "78 - 65" (72pt)
- Team names with logos
- Sport icon corner
- Tap = detail

RESULTS GRID:
- 2-column cards
- Each: sport icon, team logos, BIG score (48pt), small date
- Pull to refresh

GUEST PROMPT: Large illustration + "Registrati" button

### MATCH DETAIL
- Hero image if uploaded
- Giant score (96pt)
- Icon-based info: 📍 location, 📅 date, 🏆 tournament
- Share button (large)
- Stats with icons

### TOURNAMENTS
- Grid of cards
- Each: large sport icon background, name (bold), 📍 location, 📅 dates, 👥 teams count, status badge (color-coded)
- Filter chips with icons

### TOURNAMENT DETAIL
Icon tabs: 📊 Standings | ⚽ Matches | 👥 Teams | ℹ️ Info
- Standings: table with team logos, color top 3 (gold/silver/bronze)

### SUBMIT RESULT (Orange FAB "+" button)
Wizard steps:

1. Select Sport: 4 GIANT cards (huge icon per sport)
2. Match Type: 🏆 Tournament or 👥 Friendly (2 large cards)
3. Teams: Visual selector with logos, autocomplete
4. Score: HUGE number inputs center screen, +/- buttons
5. Location: Map with GPS button, camera for photos (3 max)
6. Confirm: Visual summary, big "PUBBLICA" button

### CREATE TOURNAMENT
Visual wizard:
- Step dots progress
- Large icons per field
- Calendar picker (visual)
- Map selector
- Team limit slider
- Public/private toggle (large)

### PROFILE
Logged: Large avatar (120px), name, 3 stat cards with icons (🎮 matches, 🏆 wins, 📊 %), sport icons, recent matches
Guest: Illustration + "Registrati" + Google/Apple buttons (large)

### BOTTOM NAV
Icons only: 🏠 Home | 🏆 Tournaments | ➕ Add (floating) | 👤 Profile

## Features

Real-time:
- Supabase subscriptions on matches
- Auto-refresh live every 15s
- Push notifications
- Optimistic UI

Interactions:
- Swipe on cards for actions
- Pull to refresh
- Long press for quick stats
- Haptic feedback
- Smooth 60fps animations
Accessibility:
- Touch targets min 44pt
- High contrast
- VoiceOver support
## Tech
React Native + Expo, Supabase backend, image optimization, fast caching

Build like Instagram for sports scores. Visual-first, icons everywhere, minimal text.
Deploy iOS, Android, Web.
